runs.task: Implement auth v1 (files+secrets): pm/users/users.json (public) + PM_SECRETS_ROOT=/home/sergei/.pm-secrets shadow.json (argon2id) + sessions/ (cookie pm_session, httpOnly). Add endpoints: POST /api/auth/login, POST /api/auth/logout, GET /api/me. Add middleware requireAuth/requireAdmin and protect write endpoints (at least task/project mutations). Add CLI command: pm bootstrap-user --username admin (creates user if missing) and pm set-password <username> (writes shadow). Add tests for login/session and bootstrap. Document env vars.
